title: GSoC Update 7-24 /7-25
author: Max (Dockerization)
content:
Snippets

  • still struggling to get pgsql into the container and have the django frontend connect to it. mostly has to do with how website is configured, so doing some container-specific changes for that
    • did some changes to the docker'd version of streaming system
    • some rearranging of website makefile to have website docker config be consistent with how we do it for the flumotion boxes
    • some changes to website/conf/setup.sh for docker compatibility.
Originally posted on Max Stritzinger
